cryptoBot.toolbox.constants module¶

cryptoBot.toolbox.constants.interval()¶

returns the time interval

cryptoBot.toolbox.constants.long_span()¶

returns the span of the long average

cryptoBot.toolbox.constants.rounding()¶

returns the minimum rounding that has to be done, is specific for traded symbol pair

cryptoBot.toolbox.constants.short_span()¶

returns the span of the short average

cryptoBot.toolbox.constants.symbol()¶

returns the traded symbol (ex: BNBUSDT)
